meanings.definition: Consisting of many cycles or rings.
meanings.sent1: The polycyclic molecule had numerous interconnected rings.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the polycyclic structure under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The polycyclic pattern on the fabric made everyone dizzy.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like a polycyclic maze, complex and intertwined.
meanings.sent5: The polycyclic design on the wallpaper was mesmerizing.

meanings.sent1: The polycyclic compound contained several linked rings.
meanings.sent2: The jewelry designer created a stunning polycyclic necklace.
meanings.sent3: The polycyclic arrangement of chairs in the room confused the guests.
meanings.sent4: His ideas formed a polycyclic web of connections, intricate and overlapping.
meanings.sent5: The tree branches formed a polycyclic canopy overhead.
